lead_paragraph: An article on Friday about the fallout from a photograph showing the swimmer Michael Phelps inhaling from a marijuana pipe referred incorrectly to the reaction of Visa, one of Phelps’s corporate sponsors. The company issued a statement in support of him; it was not among those that did not take positions.
